EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Event_TechTalks_Q314.Reminder to Attend
EmailTemplate.subject: Upcoming Event Reminder - Tech Talks at Pivotal Labs HQ - July 31, 6 p.m.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}},
This is a friendly reminder that you are registered to attend Tech Talks at Pivotal Labs headquarters on Thursday, July 31 from 6 p.m. - 8 p.m. PDT.
Event details are below.
Topic: Grow, Don't Break: How to Scale a Software Team
Date: Thursday, July 31, 2014
Time: 6 p.m. - 8 p.m. PDT
Location: Pivotal Labs, 875 Howard Street, San Francisco, CA
If you have any questions prior to the session, please reply to this email. We look forward to seeing you soon!
Regards,
The Pivotal Labs team
